definition: the activity of worshipping, love unquestioningly and uncritically or to excess
details:
noun
- the activity of worshipping
- a feeling of profound love and admiration
= synonyms: adoration
verb
- love unquestioningly and uncritically or to excess
= synonyms: revere, idolize, idolise, hero-worship
- show devotion to (a deity)
= example: show devotion to (a deity)
- attend religious services
= example: attend religious services
